extendedInfo.description: Time to Love is an application where you will find more than 2.000 love phrases. Quite easy to navigate thru all of them, and even more easy to send it to your love! via SMS, eMail, WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter and any other option provided by your Android phone.Specially dedicated to those people that are waiting for the next Valentine's Day on February 14. But also very useful for those people which just like love phrases.Try to take a look to all of them and choose the most appropiate one for your partner, mate, husband, wife..., summarizing..., your love!!What are you waiting to download this app... Cupid has it already installed on its phone!!Phrases are available in English by default. There are also phrases in Spanish, you have just to put your phone in Spanish language.
